title: 2013-02-16 - Jan 2013 - Linux SSHDoor - sample
plain_text:
# Jan 2013 - Linux SSHDoor - sample

**[contagiodump.blogspot.com/2013/02/linux-sshdoor-sample.html](http://contagiodump.blogspot.com/2013/02/linux-sshdoor-sample.html)**

Just a few accumulated samples here found and shared by others. This one is for Linux
SSHDoor malware, which can steal your SSH passwords. ESET covered that in detail in
Linux/SSHDoor.A Backdoored SSH daemon that steals passwords ( 24 JAN 2013)

The related [Linux.Chapro.A sample was posted earlier this year as well](http://contagiodump.blogspot.com/2012/12/dec-2012-linuxchapro-trojan-apache.html)

**Download**

[Download. Email me if you need the password](http://www.mediafire.com/?wpl4jjrwtx5kisc)

**Automatic Scans**
